name: PeopleSoft: Prefer boolean operators (EXISTS, NOT EXISTS) and non-negative predicates
description: Check the use of negative predicates (NOT IN, NOT BETWEEN, NOT LIKE, NOT NULL, <>, !=)
rationale:
Negative predicates (NOT IN, NOT BETWEEN, NOT LIKE, NOT NULL, <>, !=) are statements that generates full scan.
This rule is a best practice on query construction to improve performances.
remediation: Validate the query by a DBA and test it in a real environment

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
